result.title: [Experienced]Software/Data Engineer
result.description:
Job Description
Responsibilities：
- Build data expertise and own data quality for allocated areas of ownership.
- Design, build and launch new data extraction, transformation and loading processes in production.
- Support existing streaming and batch system in production, solve the on-call issues.
- Define and manage SLA for all data sets in allocated areas of ownership.
- Work with data infrastructure to triage infra issues and drive to resolution.
- Support daily project management, assist junior engineer on business and technical problems.

Qualifications：
- BS in Technical Field including Computer Science or Mathematics.
- 3+ years in the data warehouse space.
- 3+ years in custom ETL design, implementation and maintenance.
- 2+ years working with big data technologies (Hadoop、Hive、Spark etc.) .
- 2+ years with schema design and dimensional data modeling.
- 3+ years in writing SQL statements.
- Proficient in one of Programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C++)
result.notes: Send your resume and self-introduction through email titled "Referral-Name-Year of Exp / new grads-Company_name / School_name"
